mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_REPLY R LEFT JOIN TBL_GENERAL_REPLY GR ON R.ID = GR.ID LEFT JOIN TBL_REAL_REPLY RR ON R.ID = RR.ID LEFT JOIN TBL_TOGETHER_REPLY TR ON R.ID = TR.ID WHERE COALESCE(GR.GENERAL_FEED_ID, RR.REAL_FEED_ID, TR.TOGETHER_FEED_ID) = #{feedId}

SELECT SEQ_REPLY.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO TBL_REPLY (ID, REPLY_CONTENT) VALUES (#{id}, #{replyContent})
mapper.select: SELECT CASE WHEN GR.GENERAL_FEED_ID IS NOT NULL THEN 'GENERAL_REPLY' WHEN RR.REAL_FEED_ID IS NOT NULL THEN 'REAL_REPLY' WHEN TR.TOGETHER_FEED_ID IS NOT NULL THEN 'TOGETHER_REPLY' ELSE 'UNKNOWN' END AS source, R.ID AS id, M.MEMBER_NICKNAME AS memberNickname, M.ID AS memberId, TO_CHAR(R.CREATED_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS createdDate, COALESCE(GR.GENERAL_FEED_ID, RR.REAL_FEED_ID, TR.TOGETHER_FEED_ID) AS content FROM TBL_REPLY R LEFT JOIN TBL_GENERAL_REPLY GR ON R.ID = GR.ID LEFT JOIN TBL_REAL_REPLY RR ON R.ID = RR.ID LEFT JOIN TBL_TOGETHER_REPLY TR ON R.ID = TR.ID LEFT JOIN TBL_MEMBER M ON COALESCE(GR.MEMBER_ID, RR.MEMBER_ID, TR.MEMBER_ID) = M.ID WHERE R.ID = #{id}

SELECT ROWNUM R, ID, REPLY_CONTENT, createdDate, feedId, memberId, MEMBER_NICKNAME FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM R, ID, REPLY_CONTENT, createdDate, feedId, memberId, MEMBER_NICKNAME FROM ( SELECT R.ID, R.REPLY_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(R.CREATED_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS createdDate, COALESCE(GR.GENERAL_FEED_ID, RR.REAL_FEED_ID, TR.TOGETHER_FEED_ID) AS feedId, M.ID AS memberId, M.MEMBER_NICKNAME FROM TBL_REPLY R LEFT JOIN TBL_GENERAL_REPLY GR ON R.ID = GR.ID LEFT JOIN TBL_REAL_REPLY RR ON R.ID = RR.ID LEFT JOIN TBL_TOGETHER_REPLY TR ON R.ID = TR.ID LEFT JOIN TBL_MEMBER M ON M.ID = COALESCE(GR.MEMBER_ID, RR.MEMBER_ID, TR.MEMBER_ID) WHERE COALESCE(GR.GENERAL_FEED_ID, RR.REAL_FEED_ID, TR.TOGETHER_FEED_ID) = #{feedId} ORDER BY R.ID ) B WHERE ROWNUM <= #{pagination.endRow} ) WHERE R >= #{pagination.startRow}
